A self-taught Front End Developer with experience building projects for a construction company.

After working a stressful job in the accounting department, I've decided to enter the programming world to make my accounting job easier. Instead I found a new passion in creating a web application to assist with my daily tasks.

With a couple of projects completed and some of them being used at a construction company. I can say I have become confident enough to take on a new career in Front End Development with experience in all kinds of React front ends.
